actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-804.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski under authority of the order of the Senate of 07/26/2000 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 106-376.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 754.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to revise the boundaries of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000

summary.text: Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000 - Modifies the boundaries of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area, California, requiring any land for such Area to be acquired only from willing sellers.

titles.title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000
Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000
A bill to revise the boundaries of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.
